WETH().details: This value is immutable and set during contract deployment.

returns.weth: The address of the WETH token.

params.user: The address whose internal USDC balance is being queried.

returns.balance: The amount of USDC credited to the user.

bankCap().details: Deposits revert once total USDC would exceed this cap.

returns.cap: The maximum amount of USDC the bank is allowed to hold.

params._bankCap: Global USDC cap limit for the bank.
params._router: Address of the Uniswap V2 router.
params._usdc: Address of the USDC token contract.

params._deadline: Unix timestamp after which the swap is invalid.
Unix timestamp after which the swap expires.

returns.isDirectPair: True if a direct USDC pair exists.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

returns._0: uint256 Remaining capacity in USDC units.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

rescueERC20(address,address,uint256).details: Does not affect user USDC balances.

params._cap: New bank cap in USDC units.

setRouter(address).details: Also updates the factory reference to match the new router.

totalUsdc().details: This value increases with deposits and decreases with withdrawals.

returns.total: The total USDC balance tracked internally.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

usdc().details: All balances and the global cap are denominated in this token (6 decimals).

returns.usdcToken: The address of the USDC contract.

WETH().notice: Returns the WETH address used by the bank for ETH  WETH conversions.

balanceOfUsdc(address).notice: Returns the USDC balance of a specific user.

bankCap().notice: Returns the global USDC-denominated limit for the bank.

depositEth(uint256,uint256).notice: Deposits native ETH which is swapped for USDC via Uniswap V2.

depositToken(address,uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Deposits an ERC20 token which is swapped for USDC via Uniswap V2.

depositUsdc(uint256).notice: Deposits USDC directly into the bank.

hasDirectUsdcPair(address).notice: Checks whether a given token has a direct USDC pair on Uniswap V2.

remainingCapacity().notice: Returns remaining USDC capacity until reaching the global cap.

rescueERC20(address,address,uint256).notice: Allows owner to recover any ERC20 mistakenly sent to the contract.

setBankCap(uint256).notice: Updates the global USDC bank cap.

setRouter(address).notice: Updates the Uniswap V2 router address.

setUsdc(address).notice: Updates the USDC token contract address.

totalUsdc().notice: Returns the total amount of USDC currently held in custody by the contract.

usdc().notice: Returns the USDC token address used as the internal accounting unit.

withdrawUsdc(uint256,address).notice: Withdraws USDC to the specified address.
